summary: Sick of running all over skyrim chasing Easter eggs only to be disappointing with lackluster or imitation Excalibur's. Well Now you can have the real thing, and one knockoff.
descriptionHtml:
I have made this from scratch, it is not a retexture and it is more mesh than texture. It has one version with a sound modification "soul eater"
fans Will enjoy it and the rest will go mad. The other one is normal
sword sounds for those who are faint of heart. I named it estheticalibur
because mmoxreview inspires me to be a better modder.


Location:

Talos in whiterun should have both versions by his feet.

console names are:

excalibur(with sound effects)
and
estheticalibur without and slightly less stats.

Added forge:
Under Daedric
-2 Gold Ingot
-2 Silver Ingot
-5 Leather Strips
-1 Steel Sword (For Estheticalibur)
-1 Estheticalibur (For Excalibur)


Thank you everyone for your support.


My pledge:
There is no oath of modders, though I feel there should be. For me I will pledge to the community that nothing I ever create for modding
will be charged. There is no excuse for profiting of the collective work
of others. I am grateful I have been given then the tools and education
to make something I created possible to use within skyrim. I enjoy the
fact that I get to leave a part of myself in the world. I do this for my
own artistic expression, but when others enjoy it It makes me feel
wonderful, this is not a job or occupation. If I wanted that I would be
part of a team creating games or indie games. With that said donations
are always welcome for all modders I am new to this in skyrim but have
been part of the homebrew/ mod scene for a long while now. Thank you
everyone for your support let us keep mods free so everyone can enjoy
them as the works of art and expression that they are.



Donations:

author: kingarthurivvi
